title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and order tracking. Built with Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Stripe.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management system with real-time updates, team workspaces, and project analytics. Features drag-and-drop interface and customizable workflows.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard for social media managers. Aggregates data from multiple platforms, provides insights, and automates posting schedules.

title: Weather Forecast API
description: RESTful API providing accurate weather forecasts with historical data analysis. Includes rate limiting, caching, and comprehensive documentation.

title: Portfolio Generator
description: Dynamic portfolio generator that allows users to create beautiful portfolio websites without coding. Offers multiple templates and customization options.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Mobile-responsive fitness tracking app with workout plans, progress visualization, and nutrition tracking. Includes social features and achievements.
